pair.value: Change the status of an enhancement or defect for this application.
Defect Updated Info to Data Store
Defect Updated Info to Data Store
This takes the data about the defect itself from the form (new or updated) and writes it to the data store.
Enhan. Updated Info to Data Store
Enhan. Updated Info to Data Store
This takes the data about the enhancement itself from the form (new or updated) and writes it to the data store.
This writes the data about the defect status update to the data store.
If the status was changed from what it used to be, write the history to the data store. Else, write the enhacement updated info to the data store.
This writes the data about the enhancement status update to the data store.
This gets today's date as the date updated and the initiator as the updator.
If it was just released, get today as the date (script task). Else, go to Write to DB
If it was just released, get today as the date (script task). Else, go to Write to DB

If Cancel is selected, to go the end event. If nothing is selected, go back to the form. If a defect AND an enhancement are selected, go back to the form. If a defect is selected, go to the Defect node. If an enhancement is selected, go to the Enhancement node. Else, go to the end.
If Cancel is selected, go to the end. If any required fields are empty, return to form. Else, move on.
If Cancel is selected, go to the end. If any required fields are empty, return to form. Else, move on.
This gets today as the date that the defect was completed.
This gets today as the date that the enhancement was completed.
This form allows users to update information about the enhancement, change the status and add notes, or post to Tempo.

form-element.label: Notes
form-element.instructions: Required if changing the status. These notes will go to the person who requested this enhancement.

form-element.label: Newsworthy?
form-element.instructions: If this update is significant and should be posted to Tempo, click "Yes" then add a title and comments

form-element.label: Update Enhancement
form-element.instructions: You can update the status of this enhancement. If the status has changed, please provide Notes. You may also choose to post this update to Tempo.

pair.value: If the user decided to post to Tempo, the manager has to decide on the post, else, go to end.
If the user decided to post to Tempo, the manager has to decide on the post, else, go to end.
This form allows users to update information about the defect, change the status and add notes, or post to Tempo.

form-element.label: Newsworthy?
form-element.instructions: If this update is significant and should be posted to Tempo, click "Yes" then add a title and comments

form-element.label: Notes
form-element.instructions: Required if changing the status. These notes will go to the person who logged this defect.

form-element.label: Update Defect
form-element.instructions: You can update the status this defect. If the status has changed, please provide Notes. You may also choose to post this update to Tempo.

pair.value: If the status was changed from what it used to be, write the history to the data store. Else, write the defect updated info to the data store.
The user can see all incomplete defects and enhancements and choose one to update.

form-element.label: Select a Submission
form-element.instructions: Please choose a defect or enhancement that you want to change the status of from these grids.

pair.value: This gets the defect CDT for the chosen defect.
This gets the enhancement CDT for the chosen enhancement.
This goes to a subprocess where the manager can decide on the post, and then it gets posted.
This goes to a subprocess where the manager can decide on the post, and then it gets posted.
This emails the person who submitted the enhancement request letting them know that the status was changed.

a:acp.name: sppv
a:acp.a:expr: ="The enhancement you submitted ("&pv!enhancement.title&") for "&#"aeb34f04-5a2d-43ea-9031-557551195089"(pv!appID).appname&" application has been updated by the CIA Team. The status has been changed. Details are below."

a:acp.name: sppv
a:acp.a:expr: ="The enhancement you submitted ("&pv!enhancement.title&") for "&#"aeb34f04-5a2d-43ea-9031-557551195089"(pv!appID).appname&" application has been updated"

pair.value: This emails the person who submitted the defect letting them know that the status was changed.

a:acp.name: sppv
a:acp.a:expr: ="The defect you submitted ("&pv!defect.title&") for "&#"aeb34f04-5a2d-43ea-9031-557551195089"(pv!appID).appname&" application has been updated by the CIA Team. The status has been changed. Details are below."

a:acp.name: sppv
a:acp.a:expr: ="The defect you submitted ("&pv!defect.title&") for "&#"aeb34f04-5a2d-43ea-9031-557551195089"(pv!appID).appname&" has been updated"
